title: Need website developper for e-commerce/inventory
snippet:
Hey.
I am looking for cost efficiency. 
A similar basic platform will cost me $3,000.00 here. 
E-commerce and regularly updated inventory. 
Ability to add pictures, upload PDF files and of course advanced searchable criteria. 
Some password protection and ability to pay and collect payments online. 
Professional, sophisticated, classy appearance a must. 
Will discuss specifications and considering development for future projects. 

Thank you,
